programs.title: x Squared Tiles A
programs.keywords: TacTiles, algebra, voicing, x^2, x, squared, x-squared
programs.description: A program that voices the number of x-squared tiles (the coefficient of x-squared) and increments and decrements the coefficient using markers.  Note that current model range is 0-9, voicing strings range from x squared to 10x^2.

descriptionViews.name: ViewNumberOfXSquared_A

textViews.name: ViewTextTilesForXSquared_A

programs.title: X Tiles A
programs.description: A program that voices the number of x-tiles (the coefficient of x) and increments and decrements the coefficient using markers.  Note that current model range for the coefficient is 0-9, voicing strings range from x to 10x.

descriptionViews.name: ViewNumberOfX_A

textViews.name: ViewTextTilesForXTiles_A

shapeViews.name: XTilesShape_A

linkListeners.name: ControllerBooleanLeftSideForX_A
linkListeners.controlFunctionString:
// Uncomment to voice side of equation - What does this comment mean?
setBooleanOnLeftSideForX_A(BoundsLeftSideOfEquals.containsPoint( PositionForXTiles_A ));

customCodeContainer.onProgramAddedCode:
// Setting program data to the program for some sound design.
phet.paperLand.setProgramData( paperNumber, 'term', 'x' );
customCodeContainer.onProgramRemovedCode:
// Removes the term data from the model
phet.paperLand.removeProgramData( paperNumber, 'term' );

programs.title: Equation Bounds TacTiles
programs.description: A program that defines the bounds of an algebraic equation, so that the other programs representing tiles can be placed on the left and right sides of the camera's view and which can be interpreted as being on the left and right sides an the equal sign.

descriptionViews.name: ViewVoiceBoundsRotation

programs.title: Equation01
programs.description: Program to print and voice equation 1 at top of display.

descriptionViews.name: ViewVoiceEquation01
descriptionViews.controlFunctionString:
// 3x  = 2x - 3
return ( "3x equals 2x minus 3" );

textViews.name: ViewTextEquation01

programs.title: Rectangle Model
programs.description: Adding this program will enable connection sounds between tiles.

descriptionViews.name: ViewVoiceRectangleModelHelpText
descriptionViews.controlFunctionString: return ( 'Make a rectangle with your tiles. Keep long sides on long sides and short sides on short sides.' );

programs.title: Equation02
programs.description: Program to print and voice equation 1 at top of display.

descriptionViews.name: ViewVoiceEquation02
descriptionViews.controlFunctionString:
// 3x  = 2x - 3
return ( "3x^2 equals x^2 plus 8" );

textViews.name: ViewTextEquation02

programs.title: Equation03
programs.description: Program to print and voice equation 1 at top of display.

descriptionViews.name: ViewVoiceEquation03
descriptionViews.controlFunctionString:
// 3x  = 2x - 3
return ( "2x plus 3 equals 7 " );

textViews.name: ViewTextEquation03

programs.title: Equation04
programs.description: Program to print and voice equation at top of display.

descriptionViews.name: ViewVoiceEquation04
descriptionViews.controlFunctionString:
// 3x  = 2x - 3
return ( "4x plus 4 equals 2x" );

textViews.name: ViewTextEquation04

programs.title: Equation05
programs.description: Program to print and voice equation at top of display.

descriptionViews.name: ViewVoiceEquation05
descriptionViews.controlFunctionString:
// 3x  = 2x - 3
return ( "4x minus 4 equals 3x" );

textViews.name: ViewTextEquation05

programs.title: Equation06
programs.description: Program to print and voice equation at top of display.

descriptionViews.name: ViewVoiceEquation06
descriptionViews.controlFunctionString:
// 3x  = 2x - 3
return ( "2x minus 4 equals 3x" );

textViews.name: ViewTextEquation06

programs.title: Equation07
programs.description: Program to print and voice equation at top of display.

descriptionViews.name: ViewVoiceEquation07
descriptionViews.controlFunctionString: return ( "2x squared plus 4 equals 3x squared" );

textViews.name: ViewTextEquation07

soundViews.name: ViewOutOfBalanceSound
ViewInBalanceSound

textViews.name: BalanceDebugText
ViewInBalanceTextRecord

linkListeners.name: RotationBalanceChecker

programs.title: Ones Tiles B
programs.keywords: TacTiles, algebra, voicing, ones, one, numbers
programs.description: A program that voices the number of one-tiles and increments and decrements the number of ones using markers. Note that current model range is 0-9, and the voicing strings range from 1-10.

descriptionViews.name: ViewNumberOfOnes_B

textViews.name: ViewTextTilesForOnes_B

linkListeners.name: ControllerBooleanLeftSideForOnes_B
linkListeners.controlFunctionString:
// Uncomment to voice side of equation
setBooleanOnLeftSideForOnes_B(BoundsLeftSideOfEquals.containsPoint( PositionForOnesTiles_B ));
